script: Devi walks toward the visible stage stairs with confident grace.
Devi places her foot on the first step, beginning her ascent.
Devi ascends the stairs step-by-step, the camera tracking her upward movement.
The audience stands and applauds, their energy respectful and ceremonial.
Devi reaches forward and receives the golden Grammy statuette on stage.
Devi holds the Grammy, standing proudly as the soft light bloom emphasizes the moment.
